God damnit.

Okay, WinHUA apparently lied to me, totally screwed this one up.  Man this makes me look bad, but eh too good to be true.  Apparently it counted setup bin 2 and 3 as null data and snipped it, which would explain the extreme compression.  So ya, moral of the story don't use WinHUA, unless you're burning an iso from a disc that didnt use the full disc and you have null data.
